name: Fast Car Parking 3D
description:
If you are found of Parking games then you can get the Catamount Car Parking experience. Fast Car Parking 3D is interesting and adventurous game. This game consist of nine levels. Every level is different from other. The first level is easy rather then next. When car park at the exact place then level is clear and you can survive on the next level.

In a level user has three chances. If car collide with anything such as barrier, hurdles, Road walls and parking walls etc then one chance will be wasted . If all the chances waste then game is over. You can use accelerator, reverse button and steering for completion level.

How To Play:
- Accelerator button is on the right bottom side of the screen.
- The reverse button is left side of the accelerator button.
- Steering is on the left bottom side of the screen.

Features:
- Accelator
- Reverse button
- Steering
- Easy to play
- Good UI
